mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, Robert, 1816-1877
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sends an article which he feels is a "sign of the times"; claims taht it is a version of "Hamlet" with the character of Hamlet or in this case, Henry A. Wise, left out; wonders how Mr. Buchana can listen to a man so "devoid of discretion as of principle." Autograph Letter Signed. Including Typewritten Copy of above Autograph Letter Signed. 1 p. Including NwsCl of the article referred to in the letter. 1 p.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1857 November 28, Robert Tyler to ?
